name: Color Climber
description:
This is a submission for the weekly game jam #146.

This is my first jam, first game released and first time I try a platformer !

This is a game where everytime you dash, colors swap from blue to red to green.

Some levels might be impossible to do without swapping colors with your big bro.

That lead to a game mixing Puzzle and Platformer.

Overall i'm pretty happy with what I came up in 2days for a first time ! (also sry for my bad english)

A game made in collaboration with Eglantine for the art.
